price: 58. Il les réduisit en morceaux sauf l’idole la plus grande pour qu’ils reviennent vers elle.
arabic: فَجَعَلَهُمۡ جُذَٰذًا إِلَّا كَبِيرٗا لَّهُمۡ لَعَلَّهُمۡ إِلَيۡهِ يَرۡجِعُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: fajaʿalahum judhādhan illā kabīran lahum laʿallahum ilayhi yarjiʿūna
